name: Flappy Corona (MrSharpp)
description:
A Flappy corona has to defect sanitizers.

Just tap on the screen to make corona jump upwards.

This Game Have Fun And Bit Realtsic Physics of jumping as compared to other games out there. 

I have made this game with my team and this is my first game.

Please look at this game and if you encounter any bugs or if you have any suggestions to improve this game please let me know. It would help me a lot.

And If the game isn't what u expected, please forgive me.
